title: ACCOUNTS GETTING HACKED THEN BANNED/SUSPENDED. RIOTS INABILITY TO KEEP ACCOUNTS SAFE.
body:
My account got hacked recently, received an in-game message saying my account was accessed elsewhere.
Few days later I got permanently suspended.

Latest reply I got from support seems they're implying it's OUR fault for not keeping our details safe.

Went through the forum, found 5 other posts created within a week that have the same issue.
Seems like riot is having trouble keeping accounts secure.

CHANGE YOUR PASSWORDS!

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/YQ4IrvNq-morality-poll

Have a vote you and any people with similar problems should for the sake of it to give us all an idea roughly how many people are being shafted by this.

Hey there,

A majority of the recently compromised account posts have been related to phishing links being distributed by people.

Check out [this post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/8GVrAi62-security-reminder-beware-of-scamsphishing-sites) for more information.

The same thing happened to me. I came back from not playing for 6 months to find that my account had been hacked and permanently suspended for the hacker using a 3rd party software. even though the account has not been used on my IP since November of 2015 they would not reverse the ban. You would think riot would be loyal to there players who have spent hundreds of dollars and have played for 4 years

It has been extremely difficult over the last week trying to deal with riot support despite their formal replies yes, but i have not given up and will try my absolute best to find a morally sound resolution before i die.
